subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: The former Marshall defensive end Johnathan Goddard died early Sunday after a motorcycle accident in northern Florida. He was 27. Goddard’s motorcycle went off the shoulder of a road at high speed about 7:40 p.m. Saturday in Clay County, Fla., the Florida Highway Patrol said.
